This website contains most of the information and material that will be used for one of the sections of the course [Statistical Machine Learning](https://catalog.american.edu/preview_course_nopop.php?catoid=9&coid=41770) at [American University](https://www.american.edu/).

The navigation bar contains information about the [syllabus](syllabus.html), [schedule](schedule.html), [readings](readings.html), [labs](labs.html) and [assignments](assignments.html).
